assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Arvind Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, supplies, and exports textiles worldwide. It operates through Textiles, Advanced Material, and Others segments. The company offers denim fabrics, shirting fabrics, woven and knitted fabrics, and voiles and garments products. It also provides a range of specialized clothing and accessories for factory workers, fire-fighters, construction crews, soldiers, and healthcare and security personnel; hot-gas and liquid filtration products; interiors and seating solutions; and composites and coated fabrics. In addition, the company supplies water and waste water treatment plants for industrial process, and waste water and zero liquid discharge solutions. Further, it is involved in the e-commerce, technical textiles, agriculture produce, telecommunication, and other businesses, as well as offers EPABX and one to many radio solutions. The company was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Ahmedabad, India.
